sys_hub_flow.annotation: On board a new organizer to an existing group
sys_hub_flow.description: Onboard a new organizer to an existing group. Inputs are acquired from the catalog. The flow sends welcome emails and adds them to the selected group. No approvals are generated.

sys_hub_flow.name: On board new organizer existing group
sys_hub_flow.sys_name: On board new organizer existing group

flow.display_value: On board new organizer existing group
On board new organizer existing group

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi 2➛User Record➛First name,

I want to officially welcome you to the ServiceNow Developer Meetup Organizer group! Please see the Developer Meetup Organizer guide for tips and tricks on how to get started. 

Once you set a date for your first Meetup, I will reach out to you and if you want we can help you create a buzz about your event by sending out a promotional email to the developers in your area.

Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions or with feedback on how I can best support you. I look forward to working with you!

Best,

 4.3➛Group Record➛Default assignee➛Name

4.3➛Group Record➛Default assignee➛Title

servicenow
